/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the setting sun. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few wispy clouds. The sun is seen shining brightly in the distance, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and scale to the scene.
